Imps are infiltrators and corruptors who, despite their diminutive stature, are more than capable of subtly influencing a weak-willed individual into performing increasingly evil acts over time. An imp will often agree to serve a mortal and act docile and loyal in a long-term plot to eventually damn its master’s soul to Hell. Imps are born directly from Hell itself, rather than from mortal souls, and thus they serve outside the usual diabolic hierarchy, granting them leeway to pursue their specialties. Despite standing a mere 2-feet tall, imps can be vicious combatants, flying out of reach and turning invisible to escape should the odds turn against them. **[Recall Knowledge - Fiend](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 15 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10 [Imp](/Monsters.aspx?ID=109) **Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 87 **Perception** +7; greater darkvision **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Infernal](/Languages.aspx?ID=19); telepathy (touch) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +7, [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +6, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +7, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +5 **Str** -1 **Dex** +4 **Con** +0 **Int** +1 **Wis** +2 **Cha** +2 --- **AC** 17 **Fort** +5 **Ref** +9 **Will** +7 **HP** 15 **Immunities** [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72) **Resistances** physical 3 (except [silver](/Equipment.aspx?ID=379)), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126) 5 **Weaknesses** good 3 --- **Speed** 20 feet, fly 30 feet **Melee** stinger +9 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)), **Damage** 1d4-1 piercing plus 1d4 evil and imp venom **Divine Innate Spells** DC 17 - **1st** [Charm](/Spells.aspx?ID=34), [Detect Alignment](/Spells.aspx?ID=65) (at will, good only) - **2nd** [Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164) (at will, self only) - **4th** [Read Omens](/Spells.aspx?ID=247) - **Constant (1st)** [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66) **[Change Shape](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=8)** ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157))
  • **Boar** size Medium; scent (imprecise) 30 feet; **Speed** 40 feet; **Melee** tusk +9 ([finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)), **Damage** 1d10–1 piercing
  • **Giant Spider** size Medium; **Speed** 25 feet, climb 25 feet; **Melee** fangs +9 ([finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)), **Damage** 1d6–1 piercing plus 1d4 poison
  • **Rat** scent; **Speed** 20 feet; **Melee** jaws +9 ([agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)), **Damage** 1 piercing
  • **Raven** scent; **Speed** 10 feet, fly 40 feet; **Melee** beak +9 ([finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)), **Damage** 1 piercing
**Diabolic Healing** ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Healing](/Traits.aspx?ID=89), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) **Frequency** once per round. **Effect** The imp regains 1d6 Hit Points. **Imp Venom** ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** DC 16 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 1d6 poison and [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3) (1 round); **Stage 2** 1d6 poison damage, [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3), and [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) (1 round) **Infernal Temptation** ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [Evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64), [Fortune](/Traits.aspx?ID=76)) **Frequency** once per day. **Effect** The imp offers a non-fiend within 15 feet a bargain, granting a boon of good luck if the creature accepts. The boon lasts for 1 hour once accepted. If the creature dies while the boon is in place, its soul travels to Hell, where it is bound for eternity and unable to be raised or resurrected except by _[wish](/Spells.aspx?ID=377)_ or similar magic. Once during the hour, the creature can roll an attack roll or saving throw twice and use the higher result.
